page.title: 02WINDSOR CASTLE,TOWN;DATCHET
page.content: by Richard,Helen,Bradley The Private Apartments at Windsor Castle number 100;there are 685 rooms in the Castle.The Queen spends every weekend there while living in London; the Royal Standard is hoisted on the Round Tower as soon as she enters.She rides in the Home Park from 10.00 to 11.00 a.m.and walks her corgis called Smokey,Shadow,Spark,Myth,Diamond and Kelpie and her dorgis (cross between dachsund and corgi)called Piper and Chipper. Windsor town being 23 miles from London and well served by road and rail transport is a magnet for tourists who are well catered for in local hotels and restaurants. Datchet is an expanding commuter town. 80 new houses were built there in 1985 and 33 more are scheduled for construction.
